ub-section  2  of  section  405  of  the  Criminal  Procedure  Code  specifically
provides that if the person so released on bail is to appear in the High Court
or other Court, the bond must expressly say so.  The bond that the petitioner
signed on 03-12-2020 does not indicate that the surety is bound to produce
the  suspect  before  the  High  Court.  The  petitioner  undertook  before  the
Magistrate’s Court to see that the suspect shall appear in the above Court on
17-03-2021  and  continue  to  appear  until  otherwise  directed  by  the  Court.
There was no such direction from the Magistrate’s Court to the petitioner.
